QuestData.Title: Bolstering the Defenses
QuestData.Description: This island holds many dangers for us. Threats loom from every side. We must defend our hold on these shores at all costs.$b$bPerimeter wards have been placed around Dawnseeker Promontory. By default they will inflict damage, but are not fatal in their attack.$b$bNow is not the time to be merciful, $r. The perimeter wards need to be deadly!$b$bGo and empower the perimeter wards surrounding our camp.
